content.detailedDescription: I received a phone call while i was doing dishes. my mother said um, look out side i just saw something you might want to see. in going outside i looked around the sky and in plain sight there is was! a star that had come to life. had personality and spontaneity. glowing in colors then back to a bright white. aura at times was large and intense than a min later the object was a simple bright diamond. it seemed as is i could connect mentally some how finding this beautiful but inside i was kinda of frightened. my youngest daughter she is 6 was sitting with me as we watched this for over half an hour just dancing through the elevations. it would come pretty close then back off as if it were trying  to blend in with the night sky. almost 7 years and a few months ago i saw a "beautiful" sighting like this when i was driving home from my moms pregnant with my daughter that was watching it with me this past time. i took a few pictures of the sighting with my camera on a tripod! which means any kinda movement was captured for a split sec. we choose to come in when i felt like it was becoming to overwhelming. i dont truly know how to explain it but it was almost to sweet and playful that even my daughter was becoming way to comfortable with it getting  closer. i chose to go inside. the next time we checked it was gone.
content.summary: As if a star with personality and life in the sky that was playful and luring.

content.detailedDescription: The day was good and i sat with the computer to the balcony of my house. the apartment is on the top floor of a building of 5 floors in total. suddenly i noticed a dark object static northwesterly a distance of 1.5 km from my point of view.The object was wobbling slightly and began a slight decline. at my side had the digital camera. i told my mom that there is a moving object in the sky, while i start a recording about 1 minute with the digital camera i told my mom to give me the video camera in order to obtain better images of the object. my mom handed me the camera, but the object disappeared behind the small hill. as i watched the object, i saw 3 white lights on it. the lights came on and off for 2 times. the area of the event is very close to the coast.This case is very unusual and strange to my, because the area where he was the object, is an air corridor and spend many commercial aircraft. this makes me think that the object in question is not human. that if any man has enough knowledge to make objects of this type will also have enough knowledge to not cause a plane crash playing a joke with potential witnesses.
content.summary: Dark object with  blue or blue-whte blinking lights move in the sky en all directions.

content.detailedDescription: We just got home from visiting with friends about 11:45. i grabbed the dogs leash and took her out back for a short walk. it is a beautiful clear night so i was looking up at the stars when i noticed the object. it barely seemed to be moving. however i did observe it move to my left maybe an inch (from my point of view of course it could have been any actual distance) to the right, as well as both descend and ascend a short distance. it had red, green, blue lights as well as once brighter white light. it seemed to be either spinning, pulsating, or flickering the lights. by the way it is now 1:30am and this object is still within view if i step out onto my front porch. however it has slowly moved its way from seeing it straight off in front to about 45 degrees off to my right. my view of it i believe would be southeast with it traveling south. my wife was a witness to this as well and she took digital pictures and at the advice of tom sheets (who i called on my cell) recorded digital video. i have attached a couple of these below.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My wife and i saw a bright multi-colored object which seemed to be moving rather slowly in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Looking for others who have seen similar sighting: i am assuming this was some type of military experiment. 
i was the southern california desert driving south on winding a two lane highway west of palm springs at about midnight many years ago. i was laying in the backseat of a sedan looking out the rear window. 

the object caught my eye because it was moving and was so much brighter/bigger than the stars in the sky. 

it was a round or spherical object emitting bright light in all directions (like a mini-sun). the light was bright white/yellowish in appearance. the interesting thing was that several helicopters were circling the object, close enough to it that the helicopters were illuminated by it. only one chopper at first then several more joined it for a total of 5 or 6 then eventually only one helicopter remained. the object would move up and down and the helicopters would seem to follow. this happened for 10-15 minutes when eventually the object flew off into the desert. the object did not move quickly but sort of floated/lumbered along. there was no engine noise i could hear.

 i saw a similar sighting on a tv show (that's incredible) years ago. wondering if it has ever been identified or explained. thanks.
content.summary: Bright (sun-like) object in night sky with helicopter(s) circling

content.detailedDescription:
I was 9 years old, walking over to my neighbors house 2 doors down from my own early in the evening, a routine i did every single day. it was very dark outside, and the second i stepped onto the sidewalk, i saw a red/pink egg shaped object about the shape of a minivan hovering silently on top of the house i was about to approach. it looked exactly like the red clouds that appeared later that night and earlier before the sun went down. the object seemed to be almost made out of light and fog, but also seemed extremely solid.  i tried to scream, but i could not muster up a voice. i walked around the neighborhood staring at it making sure not to take my eyes off, and the object didn't budge or disappear. since nobody seemed to be noticing me in the middle of the street, i decided that it seemed that my friend was in immediate danger and that i should get as close to the object as possible and let them know there's an egg on their house. to approach the house and make a noise i had to knock on a door or a window which required taking my eye off the object for a second or 2. i decided it was worth the risk since my voice wouldn't work (probably due to nervousness), and i knocked on the door, jumped back to where i could see the object, and it was completely gone. at this point the sky seemed brighter, and my neighbors thought i had completely lost it. 

after this happened i felt compelled to not look into ufo's anymore until just this month.
content.summary: Pink misty egg shaped ufo hovers on top of roof.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness called assistant state director to file her report.

witness reported the following:  on november 8, 2010, she was riding in a car with a friend.  they were driving westbound on sunset blvd. in renton, about two blocks east of i-405.  the witness looked off to the left and saw an object that appeared to be resting on top of the trees.  she yelled at her friend to look, but the friend did not reply or react in any way. she said that they were actually above the object.  as they passed by, the witness could see that the object was above the trees, not in contact with them.

she described the object as being approximately 25 to 40 feet in diameter.  it was round, but not really disk-shaped.  she decribed it as "like a prescription bottle top". round, but with a square top.  on top was a smaller protrusion of the same shape.  set into that were square or rectangular depressions, the same color as the rest of the object.  the object was a dull, rust-brown.

the witness said that at the closest, they were about 1/2 to 1 block from the object.

when she first saw the object, she was amazed and excited.  she said that she looked around, expecting this to be some display at a business, but there were no businesses at that location.

after passing by the object, the car turned and she did not see the object again.  she does not know if it ever moved.

when her friend did not react to neither the object nor the witnesses reaction, the witness did not say anything more about it.  the witness said that she never discussed this with the other woman again, and they are no longer friends (this separation is not related to the sighting).
content.summary: Rust-colored disk, with a squarish dome.

content.detailedDescription:
Was having a smoke outside of a non-smoking business premises and noticed 4 lights off to the southwest, the land there is flat and i wondered what the heck could those lights be in that area. they seemed one or two hundred yards away and no more than a hundred yards in the air, but it was dark and i had no terms of reference. i thought it might be float plane coming in to land but the lights didn't move. then they seemed to turn a little to the north because the right hand two lights (vertically arranged) dimmed slightly, but again they didn't come any closer. then the lights turned towards me and started moving. at that point i could see two flashing red lights between and even with the lower pair of 'headlights'. again i assumed that it must be a float plane coming in to land (i was at a marina). but whatever it was moved incredibly slowly - much slower than a sunday driver, maybe 15-20 mph - and flew almost directly over head - i'd guess at no more than a hundred feet up.
i could not make out any outline of what it was - the lights didn't appear to reflect off of anything. but the strangest thing was that it was totally, totally silent. a helicopter or even an ultralight would make noise and float planes are loud. it went over the top of the single floor building, so i went inside and out the back (the north side) to see where it was going but it never showed up, as if it completely disappeared.
i'd had one slow pint but was not remotely drunk.
just curious if anyone else noticed whatever it was.
thanks for your time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 white lights initially stationary: turned, flying closer; flew overhead very low, very slowly; no noise. flew over building; disappeared before appearing on other side.

content.detailedDescription:
The first event (that i remember) took place when i was 19 years old on hart rd., taunton, ma. i was at my girlfriend's condo. we arrived home from work, ate supper and settled-in for the evening. after making love in the down stairs livingroom we, unfortunately, argued about something stupid. she fell asleep on the couch and i on the floor in front of the couch. some time later i was woken by the strangest sensation - like i was levatating, while in the lying (back-side) postion, unable to move like i was paralyzed. i was terrified as i realized that i was sort of floating back to my original place in front of the sofa, literally several inches off the floor. i instinctively knew that i was being "returned". though i was paralyzed, i tried to scream, but could not. my eyes were free to move about, though, and off to my left i could see what can only be described as a translucent orb above the front entrance/door which led to the driveway. a thin translucent cord extended from my mid section, and as the orb began to move toward me, eventually positioning directly overhead, i could see that the cord and orb were one, like a beam of light. the orb disappeared and i fell free. i jumped up and, in a panick, woke my girlfriend, blabbering this story to her. she dismissed it as a bad dream and led me upstairs to bed.
for many years afterward i would find myself in a fight to wake up from these strange moments of feeling paralyzed when asleep at night, sometimes waking not in my bed but on the floor or even in another part of the house. after such events, i intuitively knew that i had somehow been "taken" somewhere and then returned. was i sleep-walking, i thought? as a child my parents told me that i was prone to sleep-walking. but my gut told me that this was different. i have only woken during a return event twice, and they have become less frequent. i think that i am able to resist - "fight off" - these events as i have grown older, but i can't be sure. i have recently become increasingly agitated and unable (and unwilling) to sleep. something in the back of my mind is keeping me confused and anxious, as if an event were going to take place very soon. 
well, there you have it. i'm either crazy or.....
content.summary: It is difficult to describe/remember; however, i clearly remember being returned to where i originally was sleeping, being transported by a beam of light in a paralyzed state

content.detailedDescription:
First of all, you should know that i have sightings every month, sometimes i have even six sights in a week.
because of that i borrowed a digital camera, so i can take pictures of something. unfortunately the screen was broken so i wasn't able to see the focus but the camera did work.
the day i borrowed the camera, i was in my house and i went to my backyard waiting for something to happen. it was about 7:00 pm when i went out, i waited for 10 minutes when the first ufo appeared i took several pictures (because of the screen broken i had to try a lot of shots). i'm used to the ufos so i don't get scared anymore when i see them. but sometimes i really panic, i don't know why, and sometimes i feel peace. the object looked like a star, it was a point of yellow light. it was moving from south to north, it seemed to be pulsing. it never changed its speed or direction, but the intensity of the light changed from very strong to almost dissapear, it was random no secuence. i saw it for aprox. 2 minutes untill it disappeared on the horizon. 8 minutes later appeared another ufo about the same direction, and 15 seconds later another one appeared following a liitle faster with a slight different direction. both were with the exact same description of the first one. i also took pictures. 20 minutes later appeared another one with direction from south-west to north-east exactly as the first one. another one right after this one appeared from south to north. also an airplane was crossing the sky at that moment. then two ufos came from south-west to north-east in slight different directions heading to same place. at some point of the sightings i called my mom so she can see them. i took about 80 pictures of the ufo with dgital zoom, because of the broken screen i only got one good picture. it's actually strange for me that at first look the object look like a point of yellow light in the pictures youo can see it's actual shape. it's an amorph solid with three differnt lights orbit around it.
pd. the digital photo i attached shows the ufo in the left upper corner
content.summary: Ufo flight in the sky, straight line

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house outside smoking a cigarette when out of nowhere a very faint light just appeared below cloud cover. we stood there for about 30 minutes and watched it change directions in a triangular zig zag pattern. it would then hover for a few seconds and spin in one spot then move again. we stood there watching the "orb" do its thing for a minute asking ourselves what it was. we then thought nothing much of it and sat under the overhang just talking and i walked out to the yard to see if it was there and i caught a brief glimpse of the object traveling at a high rate of speed ascending out of the atmosphere into space i do believe. i went inside and about 10 minutes later i walked back out to my car and noticed that it had come back but in a different location in the sky. it was much lower this time and much brighter and discovered it had one large light in the center with three smaller lights around the center one in a triangular pattern. it was consistent in the same traveling path that it had before. i got my friends to come outside and look at it with me and we watched it for another 30 minutes and then it disappeared. my reaction to this was nothing other than just wondering what it actually was. i have had previous encounters with ufo sightings and am currently an amateur in researching the many unknown paranormal factors of our planet. i am convinced that this was a ufo of some sort and not a military aircraft of any kind. it was too high in the air for our aircraft to be piloted by man and had a much different flight pattern and speed than any manmade aircraft.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Had slight directional change, usually triangular, scarce long distance, left then came back twice

content.detailedDescription:
This is the 2nd time i've seen what appears to be the same object. the first time it was traveling due south, this time due west. i spotted it just before it passed behind the mountain. 
the best way to describe the shape is to think of a twinkie, but a bit narrower at the top, and the bottom is convex (rounded) instead of flat. it's white, with well defined edges. it doesn't look irregular, but appears to be engineered. i was standing at 7900' elevation looking south towards a nearby mountain (11,000+ ft) that forms part of the canyon i was in. the object caught my eye three or four seconds before it passed behind this mountain. it appeared to be moving fast. from where i stood, the summit of the mountain is not visible (i'm too close), so it's difficult to say if the object passed behind the mountain or over it.
it moves in a straight line and doesn't appear to climb or descend. i almost didn't report this second incident (after reporting the first) because both events were rather unremarkable. same mountain, but coming from different sides of it.
content.summary: Smooth, white object passed quickly behind mountain.

content.detailedDescription:
Bueno el dia 28 de noviembre aproximadamente a las 19 hrs sali a fumar un cigarro estaba claro aun se veia solo la luna ninguna estrella y serca de la luna veo algo mas grande que una estrella se notaba un raro contorno es como si fueran tres estrellas juntas alcanse a llamar a mi mama para que fuera a mirar y tambien lo vio apesar de qe paso mas rapido lo vimos hasta que se alejo y lo perdimos de vista.Luego el mismo dia iba a hacerme un t��� y tenia qe pasar por el patio mire al cielo(ya estaba de noche) y vi pasar una luz  del porte de una estrella se movia como tres veces mas rapido que un avion le dije a mi mama y se fue a abrigar y nos quedamos mirando.Pasaron aproximadamente 8 pero uno fue el que me llamo mas la atencion,su luz era muy brillante y mas grande que los anteriores eran como 5 estrellas juntas lo que paso fue que justo iba pasando no se si un avion o un satelite pero se cruzaron y el ovni bajo la luz apenas se cruzaron de tener una luz muy brillante paso a parecer estrella pero obvio se movia pasaron 3 segundos desde que bajo la luz y desaparecio.
ayer 29 de noviembre sali a mirar tipo 21 hrs y vi uno llame a una compa���era y lo vio del otro lado de la cuidad luego me quede como una hora mas y vi otro igual de los del dia pasado y el ultimo que vi al parecer paso muy lejos porqe se veia muy peque���o y eso .
siempre salgo al patio y miro el cielo y me parece extra���o que ahora salgo y veo uno como si nada ahora saldre a mirar porqe al parecer como que a esta hora se ven mas
content.summary: Parecia una estrella pero mas grande y muy rapida

content.detailedDescription: I saw a strange light hovering  in sky when i was in the car. then four more appeared right next to it in a line, then from left to right they dissapeared.
content.summary: Saw a strange light hovering  in sky, then four more appeared right next to it in a line, then from left to right they dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My children, an adult friend and i were camping out on the back lawn.  it was a warm still evening.  very quiet - no city lights.  we were looking up at the sky and from the horizon and passing directly over us was this huge, silent v shape of 5 lights.  it made no sound and traveled in a straight slow line, directly over us.  it took about a minute to pass completely and go on it's course.  it looked like the pheonix light sighting.  i cannot be sure of the exact month or day, but it was 1997.  this was prob about 8:00 pm.
my adult freind is a complete non-beleiver in ufo's and could not believe what we had all just witnessed.  we were all silent and stunned at what we had seen.  my kids (9 & 4) got scared and we all spent the night indoors.
i'll never forget what i saw.  i never saw anything in the paper about it -and i know that others must have seen it as well.
this was the second incident within a period of about 2-3 weeks of lights in the sky.  i will post a second report next.  it was of random white lights about 25 degrees off in the distance moving way too fast and random to be explained by aircraft of any sort.  it was also in hercules.
content.summary: Very large v shaped, silent pass over ufo.

content.detailedDescription: While driving home highway 212, east of enid, ok at appox. 2pm i spotted the craft hovering slowly from north to south across the highway. it was a couple miles ahead of me but i could clearly make out an oval shaped craft glowing brightly with red/golden light. i tracked the object across the sky, it kept a steady speed a few hundred feet above the ground, while it moved it emitted a pulsing light that seemed to be scanning the surrounding land. it turned in a more easterly direction and disappeared over the horizon. i sped up to try and see the object again however it was no where to be seen. there were other drivers who could have seen this object.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slow moving, oval shaped, red and gold glow

content.detailedDescription: My son and nephew and i were in a field when my son said whats that?? to the west there was an extremely bright orb. it slowly descended below the tree line. it appeared again at its previous location. it disappeared and reappeared very close to a passenger jet and a small twin engine plane.It disappeared again and appeared in the same location where it began. it then disappeared again. within minutes a very large black airplane flew directly overhead and i started to get concerned however my nephew said that it was a plane going back to fort hood after exercises. a few minutes later that black airplane circled back around over where we were and flew directly into the area where we observed the light. it circled around for a second time and flew again into the space where the light was. within a few minutes i realized that there were no planes taking off at abia because my house is directly in the path of planes headed west. in about 10 minutes 6 or 8 fighter jets flew directly over head and fanned out where the light was.
content.summary: Extremely bright orb appeared to the west. slowly descended behind treeline. appeared again at its previous location. disappeared again and appeared by two airplanes. disappeared again and appeared in its original

content.detailedDescription: I got up at about 425 am and went out to the back yard. i always look up when im out.I love the stars.I turned to come in and a bright light caught my eye, so i turned and seen the light was getting brighter. it finally stop getting brighter and just stayed there for about 3 mins maybe less. then it faded out. the light was "white" i have never seen anything like it.I stopped and listened and heard not crash. i have looked every where to find a answer and  have have not been able to find out what this was. please help if you can. maybe some one some where has info i hope
content.summary: Seen light in sky  it  cought my eye and i turned and it got bright, really bright,stay that way then faded out.

content.detailedDescription:
Started with one light in the sky that had been in the same spot for at least 45 minutes. i was driving during the whole sighting and was headed toward this light for like i said around 45 minutes, never changing size or character. i thought it could have been a planet because it was slightly brighter than your usual star with a faint reddish flicker. 

well to my great surprise, this light all of a sudden started to morph into multiple lights then multi colored lights. i at first was trying to discover what sort of helicopter or plane it was even though i was astonished that any of this was even taking place. my father and brother are both pilots, one commercial and the other just retired from the national guard flying chinook helicopters. at some point i considered the lights could be coming from a chinook helicopter due to the distance between the lights and the strange angles at which it was flying... first what would appear to be the nose of the craft nose down for a bit then alternated to nose up. well i was quite happy with this assumption until it changed direction and started to what appeared to be tumbling like aerobatics turning and twisting but at a very slow relaxed pace and speed. at one point it was right above my car. i have a sun roof and i opened it for the occasion. it remained directly above me for a would say a good minute, and that is when i got the best look at the craft. it continued on with this same movement pattern and the multi colored lights continued in their sequence change and patterns. it appeared as though each individual light changed multi colors and so forth. for the space craft itself, i had never seen anything like it and still do not know what to make of it. it did have some straight lines and angles, but the actual shape of it i still cannot make out to you. it i would like to say was more triangular shaped at some angles it looked diamond shaped with again, sharp angles with smooth and rounded off shapes as well. the bright alternating lights unfortunately impaired my vision to get a really clear image of its entirety. 

i was so focused on what was above me that i almost missed what was happening in my periphery. 
so just like the original light i saw, one very similar light appeared out of no where in the distance, then suddenly morphed into multiple lights then into multiple colors and shapes. had similar speed and movements. very agile and elegant like the first. then another, and another and another. they started appearing every where. somewhat evely spaced and similar flight patterns and paths. they all started i would say around 10 to 20 miles away then creeped in much closer in a very quick and effortless amount of time. then once again made a descent into the distance turning into the one bright light, then vanished. 

i was in shock and trying to keep focused on there movements and behavior to really feel anything, as well as occasionally focusing on the road and fellow travelers on the road not to collide with any to really feel anything until it was all over. i do have to say though, when that one was hovering above me, i was overwhelmed with many sensations, one being that i felt like it was connecting with me in some way. as if it new i was fully aware of its presents and sought me out. it was like it headed straight for me. when all of this was initially occurring, i called a friend of mine that i had just hung up with explaining what i was experiencing. as soon as i had left multiple messages on his phone and finally gave up, it took a b line straight towards me, then hovered above me like i explained earlier. 

once they all vanished, i did experience a strange smell. a smell not like i have ever experienced like in this area, or ever in such magnitude. it was like a chemical burn or something like that. not to pungent but very strong and quite heavy for that sort of smell. smelt it for about a mile or so. 

well, thanks for your time. oh, yes, i do want to expand a bit on my location. i live in san francisco and was was heading to stockton. i had just crossed the altamonte pass approaching the i5 junction to la all the way up to tracy. i do believe they have air force bases there, not too sure though. there is pretty much a whole bunch of nothing out there but hill billy's, cows and power plants. just in case you where interested.

thanks again,
(name removed to fi box) cms 12/01/11 08:00 cst flg
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Diamond,   Fireball,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: light all of a sudden started to morph into multiple lights then multi colored lights. at some point i considered the lights could be coming from a chinook helicopter due to the distance between the lights and the strange angles at which it was flying...

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from work that day and it was very cloudy all of a sudden. there were many different color clouds in the sky. i started taking photos while driving and when i got to the street lights along the way. i love looking at rainbows especially since i don't see them that often and when i saw these i noticed that there were two (one right behind the other). after i showed the photographs to a few people and not only thought they were odd, but that hey had never seen anything like that before.

what i saw were two rainbows, they were not moving or anything, but they were in the clouds. they had what appears to be two headlights in front of one of the rainbow. by the time i reached home which was less than 30mins, they were nowhere in the skys, but there were still a lot of clouds.
content.summary: First i want to note that the object i saw and photograped was stationary and it first caught my attention because i was looking at the rainbows. there were two of them in the same place in the sky; one behind the other. b

content.detailedDescription:
Was at a party for july 4,2011 in kc,ks shooting fireworks when i observed a large glowing reddish orange light approx. 500 ft high approaching in a straight line and then stop and disappear. approx. 2 min.Passed and 3 reddish glowing lights appeared at the same location and formed a pattern of two on the left and 1 on the right in close proximity as if it was 3 lights on 1 craft. the lights tilted sideways and separated into a very large triangular shape. it then moved off behind houses and trees. i ran to observe it and it was gone. this craft is the same as many have described of large triangular craft with reddish-orange lights. it was distinctly different from the fireworks. i was the only observer. thank you, 

[name and email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: July 4,2011 approx.10 p.M. witnessed 3 glowing lights reddish-orange in triangular shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting up in bed do soduku puzzel, hear and felt a low freguency loud hollow but strong vibrating sound (wauwn) pulsating very strong over house going east to west. i looked at clock next to bed it was 12:11, late to have anything flying around out there. i thought,that doesn't sound like helicopter or plane which i hear coming from williams gateway airport.  it was very low, i jumped up looked through blind two feet away from my bed and saw this hugh disc object with dome lights rotating opposite ways very vivid red orange color very clear in front of me in low in sky. i thought i must be nuts i have never seen anything like this before in my life, i quickly shut off nightstand light to get better look pushed blinds away it was still there hovering, i very loudly yelled for my husband to get video camera and record it in the back yard. now i'm blown away that it's just there and i am actually seeing this clearly! i grabbed my phone on nightstand and called my brother while it was still hovering telling him what i see and now i'm standing on back of small sofa and window edge to get better look because it now was getting lower and slowly moving away from me going west. i'm describing this and yelling it to my brother. i ran to backyard while my husband is filming it on camera but because he was moving he kept missing it. he did catch it on camera though. then it got smaller and smaller, no sound and was gone west. when it left i got my ladder and brought it to the back yard to get a higher angle to see if i could see where it went or what. i called my brother and he said he was on his way over to my house from chandler, az. he arrived and we hooked camera up to television and all three of us watch it again and again.
content.summary: Disc shape with domes of lights rotating on top & bottom opposite directions

content.detailedDescription: I was about 14yrs old,i lived in plainfield new jersey at that time,my grandmother would leave the house to go to work at around 5am,the morning that it happened was summer,clear skys,no clouds were present at that time,my grandmother came back into the house got me out of bed to go out and look at this thing,it was about cloud high,it was silver,it was not moving at that time,it was almost over the house,,,we watched it for a few minutes,than it started to go up straight up,untell we couldnt see it any more...This is when i became interested in this ufo..Ect....At the time i didnt think anybody would take me serious,on top of that who do you tell,my grandmother felt the same...The reason why i am telling my story now is because of mufon,and the fact that there is a place to tell people about this,,i am not crazy,,i worked in the medical field for 25yrs. thank you for mufon...............................
content.summary: Silver,disk shaped,very shinnyi

content.detailedDescription: At approx 9:17 pm i was traveling northbound i-5 approaching del paso exit i saw a craft shoot up from the ground and steadily rise up with a bright blue light, a shade of blue which i cant describe.  it looked to be circular, but as it rose its lights made it look stealth bomber in shape.  as it rose the lights changed to a green color then to a purplish pink.  it then darted diagonal in multi directions and then went downward only to rise again. as the object entered my rear view mirror the colored lights were now a pale blue and it was hovering but making a small circle.  it then dropped again and then i was out of view. this object was flying in/ over a field and no other lights were present in the field.  i called channel 40 news and there was no other reports.  i was very excited to see an object of such beautiful lights, and was in awe as it went against all known physics.  in my opinion, it could not have been man made.  i knew immediately that it was not of this world or a remote control as it went too high, too low, too fast and too far. this happened before the fog came in so i got a clear view of it.  i wanted to pull over to take a pic or video, but there was too much traffic on the freeway.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Northbound i-5, craft was to the right appeared circular but as it got closer appeared stealth like

content.detailedDescription:
I went to pick up a friend to go hunting. i saw a bright object in sky similiar to a satellite but much faster and bigger and it did directional changes. after watching it on the video i took it had many colors not apparent to the human eye. it resembled an atom like structure.

youtube link for vid is [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Bright orb but when checked on cam had charecteristics of atom

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside and noticed the object changing colors rapidly.  it looked to be flickering green, red and white strobe.  i went inside and got my binoculars.  thru them the object appeared to be moving, but i knew that could be due to the binoculars.

so i got my hd vid camera and first observed it hand held.  i was so amazed by the sight that we got a tri-pod and set it up.  the video at that point speaks for itself.  fading in and out, changing colors, red strobe on the surface, brilliant lime green body at times.

it continued for about 40 mins and then i noticed a few regular looking planes approach it.  after that it was gone in a few minutes.

we observed 4 other sets of the same lights, in other parts of the horizon.  i didn't film them as this one appeared to be the closest so i stayed on it.

i have lots more video, but i only attached the one below due to the size (i shot in hd).
content.summary: Taken from my driveway.  hd vid camera, on a tripod.  note 0:32-0:36 (you can see additional red strobe on the top) and 1:11 (it goes lime green)

content.detailedDescription: This ufo sighting occured on a very clear but very dark northeastern night sky in rural farnham virginia on thanksgiving 2011 (thursday, november, 24th) at approximately 11:45 pm. my husband and i were watching the end of a movie, when i noticed a very bright light out of our window, which i initially thought was a star, probably sirius.  however, the star appeared to grow brighter and brighter.  and then when we saw it move, we knew that this was neither a star nor an ordinary aircraft.  the stationary sparkling light moved all around.  we witnessed it dropping straight down, moving side to side in both directions, hovering, and  ascending upwards and the back again to a stationary position.  the light seemed to be more than one and grew so bright and randomly sparkly that it didn't seem like a sensible light for an aircraft. at the time, all i could think was that the blindingly bright pulsating lights like those would only impair a pilot's vision. my husband and i were so puzzled.  we couldn't believe our eyes.  we were both thinking the same crazy realization that we were witnessing something really significant, a ufo.  we got our binoculars and stepped outside to make sure we were getting an unobstructed view.  with the help of the binoculars, the large sparkling light now appeared to be a much wider horizontal band of bright, flashing, and pulsating sparkly lights that were so bright that the object behind and source of lights was hidden. sorry for all the adjectives describing the lights, but these lights were not any ordinary lights, like from lightbulbs. i just remember a lot a pulsating light movement or random sparkling and perhaps hints of color in there too that i noticed but my husband did not.  my husband describes the lighted object as slightly vibrating, fluttering or wobbling as it moved. i just noticed randomly pulsating movement of lights within lights giving off more light. the movement of the wide band of lights reminded me how sirius gives off sparkle and color when you look at it with a naked eye, but one would have magnify that by at least 100 times. we were in awe.  then, to top it off, we witnessed a fallen star shoot off to the right.  we immediately tried to get our video camera ready, but by the time we got our camera out of the cabinet and a tape ready to record, we returned to the back door to only find the lights were gone.  my husband and i were amazed, and have to confess, a little unnerved by this experience, and so far have only shared what we witnessed with close relatives and now mufon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering ufo with a multitude of horizontally band of blindingly bright sparkly lights appeared to move in unusual up and down, side to side movements.

content.detailedDescription: I should have submitted this sooner. however, i didn't. anyways, it was about 7pm, august 15th, 2011(still daylight, clear sky, and no clouds) and i was driving north bound on black horse pike in bellmawr nj. i pulled up to the light at wendys and i noticed what i thought was the front end of an airplane, about 75 to 100 yards in the air, crossing the black horse pike about a mile up ahead, going westbound. it was very low and big.I thought at first, wow, this plane is low, its gonna crash. but it continued. as it continued to cross it stopped, hovered for a few seconds, then proceded again. while looking at it, it didnt seem right... the front was rounded, but square, with no windows, but i noticed 3 or 4 windows on the side at the top, with more holes or exhaust ports on the side. it had a milky white color on the top half, and a dirty silvery metalic bottom. it was made of some type of metal, almost submarine like. as the back end came across, i was expecting to see a tail or tail wings, but there was no tail, just a little hump on the back end. it did not have any wings or rotar blades, it just drifted across the tree tops to the west and then it was gone. i was kinda taken back for a moment, like wow that was really freakin cool. i looked to the person in the car next me, to see if they saw what i saw. but they turned left and showed no interest. i serverd in the usaf as a security officer back in the late 90's and i have never seen a craft like this... to me it was a mix between a plane, a helicopter, a sub and a space shuttle rolled into one. the best way to describe its shape is, it looked like a flying metal loaf of bread... very wierd, but cool...
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cylinder,   Square,   Rectagular
content.summary: Saw a large craft like object, no wings crossing road in south jersey

content.detailedDescription: At about 1am in the morning my friend and i were sitting in his truck on a hill top in midpines, ca. we were both in deep conversation paying little attention to the darkness of the woods outside when i noticed some lights come around the mountain in the distance. at first it registered in my mind simply as a car coming around from the side of the mountain and i thought to myself "oh, i didn't know the highway was right there". interrupting himself in conversation, my friend then suddenly said "look at that!". he pointed towards the lights and i realized they were suspended in the air  and actually flying/hovering, moving in a weird up-&-down, side-to-side motion. the lights were orange that seemed to circle around the craft, or at least move from right to left down the side of the craft and a blue light that stayed in one place. completely shocked out of our minds, we both simultaneously opened our doors and got out of the car, not once looking away from the object. at this point it seemed to have stopped moving and was shining a light down into the trees below it (which seemed to be less than a hundred feet below). it remained there for the longest time, 10 or more minutes, so finally we had to get back into the car because it was freezing outside and we were shaking uncontrollably from the cold and the fear and excitement. by time we were in the car it seemed the object may have descended into the woods below because all i could see was a much dimmer version of the lights close to, or on, the ground. scared out of our whits, that's when we left.
content.summary: Late night ufo sighting in the hills, two witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my brothers' house, in his driveway working on his volkswagen.  at about 7:20pm he went inside to look for some hardware we needed.  at that time i was having a cigarette looking south and watching the planes come in to land at cleveland hopkins international airport.  almost every plane that flies in and out of cleveland flies right over parts of lakewood; i've lived in lakewood my entire life (31 yrs).  there was a descending commercial plane coming from the northeast, and was moving southwest very low (as is usual) at roughly 7:27pm. that is when i noticed this fireball looking object coming from the south moving north, which looked as if it was crossing in front of the flight path of the descending airplane.  after maybe 20 seconds, i realized this was extremely unusual.  so, i started yelling for my brother to come out and take a look.  he hurried out of the house and stood right next to me. i pointed to the object in the sky and said to him "you see that? does that look like a plane to you?���  he agreed with me that it was definitely not a plane.  at that moment, i called my girlfriend to see if she could see it from her place since she lives right near the lake, but she was not home at the time. the object moved from south to north in a pretty straight path, it was below the cloud cover, and it made no sound whatsoever.  i witnessed it from the southern edge of lakewood and my brother and i watched it move in the sky until it was not visible anymore; which was somewhere over lake erie.  it took roughly 2 minutes for it to make that path.  i definitely know the difference between airplanes (commercial, small craft, and military) and helicopters.  this was 110 percent not any of these.  it was not a meteor as it moved too slowly.  it was definitely under intelligent control. 
here is something interesting too��� about 3 or 4 weeks ago, the local news reported the times when you can view the international space station in the sky.  my other brothers��� friend went outside at that time to check it out.  he was with a friend of his, and he said that after looking in the sky for a while he saw an orange fireball below the cloud line moving from south to north, making no sound over the same city.  i believe what my brother and i saw is the same ufo my brother���s friend had seen weeks earlier. amazing!
content.summary: Fireball like object moving south to north over eastern/central lakewood.

content.detailedDescription: I was up very early soothing an infant. while lying on the couch i happened to notice what appeared to be an airliner jet pass by, which is very common for the area. i thought nothing of it at first, but then the object, which up to that point i could only make out as a series of blinking lights, abruptly started going in the opposite direction. airplanes don't do that, i was thinking. i then observed the object move back and forth in a zigzag manner, then started strobing like a police car flashing, but only white light. okay, weird. itremained stationary while puting on this display. after about what seemed like a minute it became a very bright, single point of light which proceeded to move in an apparent straight line from south to north. it quickly went out of my line of sight and i had to run to a window at the opposite side of the house. i was able to get sight of it again and watched it for about another minute until it disappeared beyond the horizon. i was never scared. on the contrary, i was fascinated.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strobing light in sky. moved straight like plane at first, then made zig zag maneuvers. stopped strobing, became single bright white light moving from one end of the hoizon to the other, making abrupt minor course corrections.
